import ListOfElements from '../../components/ListOfElements' import Button from '../../components/Button' import Menu from '../../components/Menu' import { useHandleClickMovie } from '../../hooks/handleClickMovie' import { useLocation } from 'wouter' export default async function SearchMovies({ params }) { const keyword = params const [,pathlocation] = useLocation() const {handleClick, parameter} = useHandleClickMovie(keyword) const list = { 'HOME': '/', 'MOVIES': `/search/movie/${params.keyword}`, 'SERIES': `/search/serie/${params.keyword}`, 'GAMES': '' } if (parameter.length === 0) { setTimeout() pathlocation(`/search/serie/${params.keyword}`) } return
}
